name: Brain Bouncer
description:
Available on Google Play!

This casual game is sure to bounce your brain!  In this puzzle game, your goal is to hit yellow stars with a bouncy pinball. To do that, you must rearrange shapes and pieces on the board, so that the ball will bounce off of them.  There are also plenty of other obstacles and bonuses for the ball to hit (and maybe avoid, in some cases).  It's a physics-based, collision-filled challenge that tests your problem-solving skills.

This is currently very much in development, we are continuing to add to and improve it.  We appreciate any and all constructive feedback. 

I also am interested in how easy it is for people to pick up and understand how to play the game, so please leave comments and feedback in that regard.

The song in the game is "Snowy Forest" by Kabbalistic.
